text_block_list.text: ――The incident occurred the day before the Selection Race.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Trainer!!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Hah… Sorry to stop you so suddenly. Actually, there's a girl I'm looking for…
I asked her for a description of the underclassman that Fuji Kiseki was looking for. However, I had no idea where she might be…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I see… Alright, thanks anyways. If you see her, would you mind asking her to contact me?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I'm sure all the girls in Ritto Dorm know my contact information. I'm counting on you!! I'll be on my way.

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Just now, that's Fuji-senpai, right…? She seemed to be in a big hurry, but what happened?

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: One of the kids from Ritto's been missing since this morning. It's going around that she might've sneaked out of school.

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Ahh, there are a lot of girls like that, aren't there? …Wait, don't tell me, Senpai's been looking for her all morning!? Even though tomorrow is the Selection Race!?

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I was wondering if her training will be alright… But it's Fuji-senpai, so I'm not worried.
However, despite searching around for her based on the characteristics Fuji Kiseki had told me, I was unable to find the underclassman.
Meanwhile, night fell――

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Trainer…!? What's the matter with you here? Not only that, you're drenched in sweat…
choice_data_list: I thought I'd help with the search.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Is that so…! You are… a truly kind person. Thanks, that helps.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Actually, the only other place I haven't looked is this park―

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text: …Gulp.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Ah! That voice just now, could it be…!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: …Hello there, Pony-chan. What are you doing at a place like this in the dark?

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text: Eh… Fu, Fuji-senpai…!? Oh no, why…!! Don't worry about someone like me, please just get ready for tomorrow…!!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: 'Someone like me,' so you say… Why do you say such lonely things? You are a valued member of Tracen Academy.

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text: You're wrong! I'm… no longer good enough. I can't stay at this school anymore.

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text: The rigorous training was so hard, and I missed my family… My yearning to race went away…!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Your yearning to race… you say.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: …Do you want to get that feeling back? Or, do you want to just drop everything and go home?

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text: Th, that's…

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text: If I could get it back, I would… Because running in races has been my dream for a long time. But…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Right, then! If that's what you wish for, I'll make it happen.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I shall surely remind you of your longing for racing. I will show you that kind of "miracle" in tomorrow's race!

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text: You'll show me, that "miracle"…?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: That's right. …So, let's head home for today.
That's how she somehow succeeded in bringing the junior back home…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Really… Fuji, I was afraid that even you wouldn't come back.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Ahahaha, sorry, sorry! Thanks for watching Ritto Dorm while I was out, Hishiama.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: And you, too. That was really heartening!
choice_data_list: Glad you found her safe and sound.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: …C'mon, it's almost time for lights out. You should get some rest too, Fuji. You have a race tomorrow, don'cha?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: I'm talkin' about you. Just 'cause you couldn't train all day today doesn't mean you're out of shape, y'know? So, you should focus on rest.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: …You're right.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: …Don't think of doing anything weird, alright? 'Night, then.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Indeed, goodnight.
After that, I left them and went back to my room, but I couldn't help but notice the look on Fuji Kiseki's face.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: The entertainer that always delights everyone, "Fuji Kiseki"! That's who I'd like to be.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: With "Kiseki"'s running, I'll entertain everyone who watches me…!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: That's me――dashing across the track, "Fuji Kiseki"!!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I shall surely remind you of your longing for racing. I will show you that kind of "miracle" in tomorrow's race!
…Would Fuji Kiseki, who had been focused on entertaining people as much as she was, really turn in quietly like this?
choice_data_list: (…I have a bad feeling about this.)

text_block_list.text: Worry managed to worm its way into my thoughts, so I went to make sure Fuji Kiseki was properly resting, only to find――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Damn, that girl! She's got a real cool look on her face, but she'll do something like this in a heartbeat!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: …Ahh, you, you're the trainer who was with Fuji earlier, right?
choice_data_list: Don't tell me, something happened to Fuji Kiseki?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Annoyingly enough, you're spot on! That girl disappeared from her room. Not only is it unforgivable for a dorm head to break curfew, but also lights-out time!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Right, you and I, we want the same thing. Let's split up here.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: You know, the places where she usually trains? I think it's a riverbed, a shrine, and――
Thus, I came to the training spot where Hishi Amazon told me to go looking for Fuji Kiseki.
Then――

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: …! Hah, hah, haa…!!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Ah… Wait, Trainer…!?
